issue.message: Consider using `apply()` instead; `commit` writes its data to persistent storage immediately, whereas `apply` will handle it in the background

Attribute `targetCellHeight` is only used in API level 31 and higher (current min is 26)

The Network Security Configuration allows the use of user certificates in the release version of your app

Implementing a custom `X509TrustManager` is error-prone and likely to be insecure. It is likely to disable certificate validation altogether, and is non-trivial to implement correctly without calling Android's default implementation.
